961750.name: Rope Racer O'Neon
961750.description:
Simple, but very funny physic puzzle game.

This is a neon world and racers who can use the rope.
Choose your car, paint it however you want, gather crystals and try to cross the finish line!
Earn money for the best vehicle.
Physics will help you.
Avoid the walls, ride on the ground.
Swing on the rope, jump, fly up and hover!
Also, you can open game modes: gravity, boost and teleportation.

Special features:
- Ropes
- Vehicles
- Retrowave music
- Meditative gameplay
961750.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 土耳其语, 日语
